topLayout.description1: I am Japanese, working as a FrontEnd developer living in Munich.
topLayout.description2: Currently, I am looking for a position of Frontend Developer in Munich
topLayout.description3: In this website, you can find about my background and portfolio

footer.name: Michihiro Goto

footer.profile2: Frontend Developer for Digital AI assistant bot
footer.success: Thank you for the message. I will reply to you soon!

introduction.name: Michihiro Goto
introduction.description: I am from Japan, and 30 years old living in Munich. Currently I am working as a Frontend developer at a startup company in Munich. My life hobby is to travel around the world, and programming which I have been obsessed since I started spending most of my free time at home in Corona pandemic.

basic.detail: I grew up in the City of Otsu, where we have the biggest lake in Japan called Lake Biwa. Otsu is adjacent to Kyoto which is well known as the ancient capital of Japan, and it is only 15 minutes by train.

master.degree: Master of Sicence in Mechanical Engineering

bachelor.degree: Bachelor of Sicence in Mechanical Engineering

education.detail: I majored in Mechanical engineering in Kyoto institute of technology(KIT). During total 6 years of bachelor and master courses in KIT, I spent the precious time to learn the basic of mechanical engineering which led to my successful first career as automotive engineer in Germany. Not only for this, it was definetely worth being in Kyoto which attracts many international students around the world. Over this 6years in Kyoto, I could nourish my own international mind, and makemany connections with foreign people.

career.detail: After 6 years of experience of Mechanical Engineering in Automotive Industry, I got the strong interest of switching my career to different engineering field. Especially, I was strongly attracted to Web application Engineering while I was self-learing coding. So I kicked off my next career as Frontend Developer in 2022. Currently, I am in charge of front-end development of portal site for purchasing mechanical components using React with Typescript
